title: PurpleFoxHost API Docs
subtitle: API Documentation for the PurpleFoxHost API.

base.info: All Endpoints support the CRUD protocol.

auth: This API requires authentication for ALL endpoints.

contact.info: If you need help using this API, join our Discord server.

endpoints.name: Checkpassword
endpoints.text: Check if a password is correct

endpoints.name: Deleteuser
endpoints.text: Delete a user from the system and panel

endpoints.name: Newuser
endpoints.text: Register a new user to the panel and billing

endpoints.name: Validatelogin
endpoints.text: Check if a email matches a password
